tool_description: The input natural skin images are used to predict the classification of skin diseases, and common diseases such as `acne`, `actinic keratosis`, `alopecia androgenetica`,` alopecia areata`, `bullous dermatosis`, `chloasma`, `corn`, `dermatofibroma`, `eczema dermatitis`, `erysipelas`, `erythema multiforme`, `folliculitis`, `furuncle`, `haemangioma`, `herpes`, `herpes` `simplex`, `iga vasculitis`, `keloid`, `keratosis follicularism`, `lichen planus`, `lupus erythematosus`, `molluscum contagiosum...
name: Detect Skin Disease
title: Detect Skin Disease

api_list.name: Detect Skin Disease

data.description: The content of the result data returned.

results_english.description: 【English】The predicted results. Contains Key-Value pairs, where Key is the disease name and Value is the probability.

results.description: 【Chinese】The predicted results. Contains Key-Value pairs, where Key is the disease name and Value is the probability.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPG` `PNG`
- **Image size**: No more than 20 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Less than 1280x1280px.

utterances.utterance: Can you analyze this JPG image of a skin rash and tell me what disease it might be?

parameters.image: JPG image of a skin rash

utterances.utterance: I have a PNG image of a suspicious mole. Can you detect if it’s a skin disease?
